props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: by
props.description: Use this to compare objects by a particular field, or pass your own comparison function for complete control over how objects are compared.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the combobox when it is initially rendered. <br> Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The value of the listbox when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the Listbox

props.name: dir
props.description: The reading direction of the listbox when applicable. <br> If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with listbox

props.name: highlightOnHover
props.description: When true, hover over item will trigger highlight

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the listbox. Can be binded with with v-model.

props.name: multiple
props.description: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the Combobox. Can be binded with with v-model:open.

props.name: required
props.description: When true, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: resetSearchTermOnBlur
props.description: Whether to reset the searchTerm when the Combobox input blurred

props.name: resetSearchTermOnSelect
props.description: Whether to reset the searchTerm when the Combobox value is selected
